Applicant : Morales, Melanie
School (district) : Bridgewater Elementary (Bonneville School District 93)
Role(s) : Upper Elementary Teacher (3rd+);Middle School Teacher;
LinkedIn Profile : I speak polite Spanish and enjoy learning about other cultures, I drove through Central America to Panama to visit my husband's family.  I enjoy making items, I used to have a booth at the local farmer's market where I sold handmade soap.  I also like to garden and am interest in green agricultural practices.  

INTERESTS
Why they want to be a part of this program:
	* I would like to be able to help my students think of different careers they might have the establish the paths they can take to achieve their goals.

	* Hybrid

Grade Levels: 
	* 3
	* 4
	* 5
	* 6



STEM Domain Experience
	* Chemistry
	* Agriculture, Food, Natural Resources
	* Math

Business software & skills:
	* Spreadsheet Software (MS Excel or Google Sheets)	* Presentation Software (MS Powerpoint or Google Slides)	* 
Instructional work they are open to during externship:
Elementary teaching : No
Secondary Teaching : Yes
Adult Teaching : Yes
Camp counselor : Yes
Curriculum design : Yes
Externship durations they are available for:
Other interesting experience:
I speak polite Spanish and enjoy learning about other cultures, I drove through Central America to Panama to visit my husband's family.  I enjoy making items, I used to have a booth at the local farmer's market where I sold handmade soap.  I also like to garden and am interest in green agricultural practices.

Business software & skills:
	* Spreadsheet Software (MS Excel or Google Sheets)	* Presentation Software (MS Powerpoint or Google Slides)	* 
Instructional work they are open to during externship:
Elementary teaching : No
Secondary Teaching : Yes
Adult Teaching : Yes
Camp counselor : Yes
Curriculum design : Yes
Externship durations they are available for:
Other interesting experience:
I speak polite Spanish and enjoy learning about other cultures, I drove through Central America to Panama to visit my husband's family.  I enjoy making items, I used to have a booth at the local farmer's market where I sold handmade soap.  I also like to garden and am interest in green agricultural practices.  

LOGISTICS

	* In-Person	* Hybrid	* Remote	*

	* Communication & Availability : Text or email during the day.

	* I would like to be able to help my students think of different careers they might have the establish the paths they can take to achieve their goals.
STEM fields they are particularly interested in learning more about:
	* No specific preference - anything goes!
